name: Five-a-Side Soccer
overview: A very simplistic version of indoor soccer played against the computer or another player. Each game lasts 10 minutes, with full crowd atmosphere and an announcer to keep you up to date with the action on the field. The tackles bite hard and the players twist, turn and shout as the crowd roars their approval. Play a full game or take part in a penalty shoot out. Released as part of "Commodore Pro-Pak" game pack.
